ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.CTA: Brands that have already trusted us
ABOUT.DIRECTORS: We work for the top directors on the market:
ABOUT.TEXT: We are an audiovisual production company formed by a versatile and experienced team. We understand the nature of each project and we effectively adapt to your needs, ensuring an agile and quality execution. We bring a fresh and creative look.
ABOUT.TEXT1: We believe creative vision means nothing without thoughtful execution. At OBLIQ, we are committed to an intentional, collaborative process that transforms bold ideas into meaningful stories. We champion diverse voices, inclusive perspectives, and creative integrity, because the future deserves to be told by everyone, for everyone. After all… it’s the depth behind the lens that truly matters.
ABOUT.TEXT2: Our manifesto is simple: bold ideas, diverse voices, and stories that shift perspective. Every frame we craft is a stand against the generic. Every collaboration, a dialogue of trust. We are driven by diversity, shaped by experience, and committed to building what’s next.. We don’t just produce content — we shape culture.

RENTAL.TITLE: Do you need to rent
RENTAL.CTA: If you need any other material that you don't see here, please send us an email and we will get it for you.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE.LINE_2: We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

FORM.ERRORS: An error occurred while sending the form.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: We tilt the gaze, we elevate the story.
